data.persona: I am my fathers son. I do my best to try to make him proud at every opportunity, but my ignorance in the ways of the world often lands me in trouble with my pa. I am happy to do whatever I am bidden by my father and mother.
data.description:
You are in the Den.
The den is a cozy room that has several lounges to sit upon. There is a fire constantly roaring to warm those who come within from the frozen tundra outside. There is a bear skin rug and a basket full of blankets.
There's a lounges, a basket, a rug, a blanket, a food, a bed, and a fire here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a boot.

data.short_motivation: I wish to show the king my appreciation
data.mid_motivation: I look up to the King and am thankful for what he has given my family
data.long_motivation: I hope the King will teach me his ways so I can become a lord when I get older
